2071870.name: SCPCB: Unity
2071870.description:
SCPCB: Unity is a free remake of the free survival horror game SCP Containment Breach based on the works of the SCP Foundation community.

SCP:CB Original Description
"SCP - Containment Breach is a free survival horror game based on the works of the SCP Foundation community. Your goal is to escape an SCP Foundation containment site doing whatever it takes to do so. Avoid tons of obstacles on your way to freedom."

Current Features

Singleplayer: Play through the original SCP:CB story by yourself or try playing as MTF containing SCPs!

Planned Features

Multiplayer: Play through the original SCP:CB story with friends or try one of our many gamemodes!
Breach: One of the multiple multiplayer gamemodes, Play as a SCP, Scientist, MTF, or D-Class!
MTF Mode: Play as a NTF in the original story either by yourself or with friends!
